alert.note: Alert for Clay; Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:57PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clay and northwestern Nuckolls Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 757 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lawrence, or 19 miles southeast of Hastings, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deweese around 805 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
